dict.acceptation: 证明，论证；实物示教，示范；示威游行；表示；

sent.orig: Student ability the way of the demonstration main have classroom demonstration, demonstration outside the lesson.
sent.trans: 学生能力展示的主要有课堂展示，课外展示。

sent.orig: It has become another important means of demonstration in physics teaching besides the material object demonstration.
sent.trans: 它已日益成为物理课堂教学中除实物演示之外的又一种重要的演示手段。

sent.orig: New York city City has an unusual demonstration demonstration farm for Hidral Parnickshydroponics.
sent.trans: 纽约城市有一个不普通的为了水耕培德展示。

sent.orig: New York city City has an unusual demonstration demonstration farm for high feral ponicshydroponics.
sent.trans: 纽约市有一个独特的水耕法的示范农场。

sent.orig: Counterdemonstration:a demonstration held in opposition to another demonstration.
sent.trans: 反示威：与另一个示威相对立。
